basics.label: Mortgage Group Operations Manager, Banking Officer
basics.summary: Self-motivated banking professional offering strong communication and quick thinking skills. Works effectively on teams, as well as independently, in fast-paced environments.

work.name: BB&T
work.position: Mortgage Group Operations Manager, Banking Officer
work.summary: Monitor and approve pricing deviations in accordance with BB&T policy. Monitor pipelines to ensure compliance and timely action for clients by Mortgage Loan Officers (MLOs).

work.name: BB&T
work.position: Home Mortgage Direct Mortgage Loan Counselor
work.summary: Provide mortgage clients sound mortgage advice based on a full understanding of client needs as well as BB&T Mortgage products and their benefits.

work.name: BB&T
work.summary: Responsible for spreading financial statements and tax returns according to GAAP and internal credit policies.

work.name: BB&T
work.summary: Loan administration duties include the review and preparation for assigned loan portfolio.
